event.title: Checkout Started
event.description: User initiated the order process (a transaction is created). Changed
event.example:
analytics.track('Checkout Started', {
  order_id: '50314b8e9bcf000000000000',
  affiliation: 'Google Store',
  value: 30,
  revenue: 25.00,
  shipping: 3,
  tax: 2,
  discount: 2.5,
  coupon: 'hasbros',
  currency: 'USD',
  products: [
    {
      product_id: '507f1f77bcf86cd799439011',
      sku: '45790-32',
      name: 'Monopoly: 3rd Edition',
      price: 19,
      quantity: 1,
      category: 'Games',
      url: 'https://www.example.com/product/path',
      image_url: 'https://www.example.com/product/path.jpg'
    },
    {
      product_id: '505bd76785ebb509fc183733',
      sku: '46493-32',
      name: 'Uno Card Game',
      price: 3,
      quantity: 2,
      category: 'Games'
    }
  ]
});

affiliation.description: Store or affiliation from which this transaction occurred

total.description: Revenue with discounts and coupons added

discount.description: Total discount associated with the transaction

coupon.description: Coupon code associated with the product

currency.description: Currency code associated with the transaction

products.description: Products displayed in the product list

product_id.description: Product ID displayed in the list

sku.description: Product SKU displayed in the list

category.description: Product Category displayed in the list

name.description: Product Name displayed in the list

brand.description: Product Brand displayed in the list

variant.description: Product Variant displayed in the list

price.description: Product Price displayed in the list

quantity.description: Product quantity displayed in the list

coupon.description: Coupon code associated with the product

position.description: Position of product in the list

url.description: URL of the product page for product in the list

image_url.description: Image url of the product in the list
